favourite.article: Praise the Lord! Now I know it all, Have heard and known His voice, And hear it still from day to day. Can I enough rejoice?
Come and rejoice with me! For I have found a Friend Who knows my heartâ€™s most secret depths, Yet loves me without end.
Praise the Lord, we have to pray and thank Him because we have found a Friend in Jesus. AMEN! AMEN! AMEN!
